title: KOHLER 14443-BN Robe Hook, Vibrant Brushed Nickel

description: Purist accessories combine architectural forms with sensual design lines for a modern, minimalist look. with a round profile, this robe hook offers a simple silhouette and convenient place to hang your robe, towel, or clothing in the bathroom.

Purist faucets and accessories combine simple, architectural forms with sensual design lines. This Purist robe hook is both sculptural and highly functional. Available in durable, lustrous finish choices, including Vibrant PVD color finishes, the Purist robe hook reliably withstands the demands of daily use while providing design continuity. Featuring careful detailing and a minimalist aesthetic, this robe hook coordinates perfectly with the Purist Suite of fixtures, faucets and other accessories to create a serene and soothing environment. The clean, sleek style of each piece is mirrored in the Purist Suite, delivering a calming force in any contemporary bath or powder room. In the tradition of classic modernity, Purist faucets and accessories offer visual interest without adding clutter.

Expectations have changed for todays bathrooms. But whether youre creating a serene, spa-like environment in the master bath or breathing new life and character into a powder room, KOHLER® bathroom faucets and accessories provide inspiration and lasting performance. Crafted from premium quality materials, our faucets and accessories are available in a wide array of colors and finishes, including Vibrant® PVD color finishes that are remarkably resistant to staining, corrosion and tarnish. Our ceramic disc valves are tested for 500,000 on/off cycles  twice the industry standard  to deliver reliability and long life. Additionally, Rite-Temp® showering technology ensures water temperatures do not fluctuate. KOHLER bathroom faucets and accessories embody innovative excellence from fresh twists on vintage styling to pioneering the use of different materials. And "No Sweat" installation with flexible water supplies and pre-assembled valves saves you time, effort and money. With design themes ranging from classic to contemporary and our tradition of meticulous craftsmanship, KOHLER bathroom faucets and accessories allow you to express your personal sense of style with confidence.
All KOHLER faucets carry a lifetime limited warranty for as long as the original consumer/purchaser owns his or her home.

Always a leader in innovative design, Kohler pioneered the concept of creating families of plumbing fixtures, faucets and accessories featuring like design elements that resonate among the pieces. Today these families have evolved into our distinct, stylish bathroom suites and ensembles. Each unique KOHLER suite brings together a matching bath, lavatory and toilet, as well as faucets and accessories, for a complete design solution. Our ensembles are comprised of a coordinated lavatory and toilet with integrated styling to perfectly suit a powder room or complement a bath or whirlpool when furnishing a full-sized bathroom. Various suites also offer corresponding tabletops, cabinets and bathroom furniture to provide a one-stop shopping experience. A wide array of sizes, shapes and KOHLER colors and finishes is available to accommodate personal preferences and particular space configurations.
simplify the process of achieving a unified look that reflects your individual style.

Our Purist Suite, with its serene sophistication, transforms the bathroom into a home spa. Its fixtures, laminar faucets capture the language, the feeling, the art of water. Classic materials balance the unexpected to compose evocative, changeable forms  a quiet backdrop for the poetic simplicity of water.

Founded in 1873 and headquartered in Kohler, Wisconsin, Kohler Co. is one of Americas oldest and largest privately held companies. Kohler is a global leader in the manufacture of kitchen and bath products, engines and power generation systems, cabinetry, tile and luxury home furnishings, and international host to award-winning hospitality and world-class golf destinations. Kohler Co. is known around the world for plumbing products, its traditional core business, and its flagship brand: KOHLER.
